3673922083.description:
On Weapon Kill:
Increased damage, slower Rate of Fire/Charge Rate, and 10 Range for 7 seconds.

3722653512.description:
While at Low Health:
Up to 60 Airborne Effectiveness.
Effect increases linearly as Health decreases. Maximized strength at Critical Health.

Enhanced: Grants up to 66[?] Airborne Effectiveness.
